attributes.action: Backdate the Inheritance Tax Threshold Increase of 9/10/07
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The inheritance tax threshold was recently increased from £300k to £600k but only for deaths occurring AFTER 10/10/07.  For deaths occurring before this date (even one day), their estate will pay up to £120K extra in tax.  

This doubling of the threshold demonstrates how out-of-date the old IHT limit was, and as a result many estates have paid way too much tax. 

This is an extra kick in the teeth for those who have lost their loved ones very shortly before this increase came into effect. 

So, we request that the IHT threshold  increase is back dated seven years to 9/10/2000 and refunds given as appropriate to those who have paid excessive tax in this period.
